main.name: Ahmad Noor
main.description: Highly Motivated Self-taught Software Engineer Who Specialized in Javascript
main.bio: I'm a Highly motivated, self-taught Software Engineer who specialized in JavaScript.I love to work with Javascript and ReactJs.Equally passionate about both frontend and backend applications, I have worked with a wide variety of clients and server-side web development frameworks, languages, and databases.A frequent contributor to open source projects.I keep myself up to date with new technologies and greatly focus on design architecture, code optimization, and all performance-related things.My interest includes client-side optimization techniques and deep Javascript learning.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: I have been working at mobileLive for the past year as Fullstack Javascript Engineer.i am Taking part in building new front-end site for a client and Participating in providing mentoring and training for junior developers.i Greatly focused on cross-browser compatibility, responsive design with a mobile-first approach, user interaction, web accessibility and client-side.i am also working in NodeJs for Implementing web development life cycle policies and procedures REST API

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
